title: Riot hasn't responded about my account being compromised :(
body: I submitted a ticket and got an email conformation saying that my ticket was submitted but anytime I try to click the link that says review my ticket it says "Not found" when I am redirected to the support site. I gave ample information to prove that this is my account and someone has changed my verified email! I'm afraid he'll get my account banned or something. I've been playing for 5 years and this is the first time this has happened I'm freaking out!

replies.body:
We'll have an account specialist with you as soon as possible. We have tons of tickets created every day, so we address them on a first-come-first-served basis. Sit tight and we'll work with you on resolving this together.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you. I'm just worried about my account being banned or something in the meantime. Should I just let them do the damage and let you guys handle it later or is there anything preventative that I should be doing. They sent a mass botted message to my friends saying to go to like this smurf website.

Since they changed your verified email, it's likely they had access to that email. I suggest changing the password of that email, then enabling 2-step verification if your email provider offers that service.

We'll take care of the rest when we get back to you in your ticket.
Alright thank you for your help again. I'll just sit tight and hope you guys can help me from here.
